mapper.select: SELECT main.auth_name, main.auth_id, COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT a.auth_id, a.user_id, b.auth_name FROM tb_user_auth a LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_auth b on a.auth_id = b.auth_id) main GROUP BY main.auth_name, main.auth_id ORDER BY main.auth_id ASC
SELECT auth_id, auth_name FROM tb_auth WHERE auth_id = CAST(#{authId} AS INTEGER)

SELECT userM.user_name, auth.auth_name, main.* FROM ( SELECT auth_id, user_id FROM tb_user_auth WHERE auth_id = CAST(#{authId} AS INTEGER) ) main LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_auth auth on main.auth_id = auth.auth_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_user userM on main.user_id = userM.user_id
SELECT user_id , user_name FROM tb_user WHERE user_id NOT IN (SELECT user_id FROM tb_user_auth WHERE auth_id = CAST(#{authId} AS INTEGER))

choose.when: UPDATE tb_auth SET auth_name = #{authName} WHERE auth_id = CAST(#{authId} AS INTEGER)

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user_auth (auth_id, user_id) VALUES (CAST(#{authId} AS INTEGER), #{userId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_auth WHERE auth_id = CAST(#{authId} AS INTEGER)
